name: Multi-dimension Conflict 冲突次元
description:
In Multi-dimension Conflict 冲突次元, you will play a loyal commander, seizing an artifact for your forces that can remove all dimensional barriers.

This is a new tower defense game. Maybe the defense tower itself is not so important. It is important to match different modules to achieve different defense effects.

This is also a card collection game, collecting different cards, which can make your defense tower have different ability modules in the battle.
